results.title: Comparison of subgroups assigned to medical regimens used to suppress cardiac ischemia (the Asymptomatic Cardiac Ischemia Pilot [ACIP] Study).
results.text_hl: This report focuses on the subset of 235 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from the Asymptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@Cardiac Ischemia@@@ Pilot (ACIP) study receiving randomly assigned medical therapy to treat @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ and suppress @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ detected on ambulatory electrocardiography: 121 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received the sequence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@, and 114 @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Isosorbide_Dinitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007548 @@@isosorbide dinitrate@@@.

results.title: Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ appears to be effective as an anti-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ agent in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with obstructive @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ when reduction in myocardial @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@ supply (@<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ not preceded by an increase in heart rate and due presumably to functional @DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@) or increase in demand are the likely causes.

citations.NLM: Cruickshank JM, McAinsh J. Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview. Curr Med Res Opin. 1991;12(8):485-96. PMID: 1764953
citations.BibTeX: @article{1764953, title={Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.}, author={Cruickshank JM and McAinsh J}, journal={Curr Med Res Opin}, volume={12}, number={8}, pages={485-96}}

results.title: Atenolol depresses post-ischaemic recovery in the isolated rat heart.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to assess the effects of the beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and the high energy demand in an @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@-@DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion@@@ model free of neurohormonal and vascular factors.

citations.NLM: Allibardi S, Merati G, Chierchia S, Samaja M. Atenolol depresses post-ischaemic recovery in the isolated rat heart. Pharmacol Res. 1999 Jun;39(6):431-5. PMID: 10373241
citations.BibTeX: @article{10373241, title={Atenolol depresses post-ischaemic recovery in the isolated rat heart.}, author={Allibardi S and Merati G and Chierchia S and Samaja M}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={39}, number={6}, pages={431-5}}

results.title: Effects of atenolol alone, nifedipine alone and their combination on ambulant myocardial ischemia.
results.text_hl: Compared with placebo, @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ reduced the total duration of @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ (p less than 0.05) but the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ duration was of borderline significance (p = 0.066).

citations.NLM: Hill JA, Gonzalez JI, Kolb R, Pepine CJ. Effects of atenolol alone, nifedipine alone and their combination on ambulant myocardial ischemia. Am J Cardiol. 1991 Apr 1;67(8):671-5. PMID: 2006616
citations.BibTeX: @article{2006616, title={Effects of atenolol alone, nifedipine alone and their combination on ambulant myocardial ischemia.}, author={Hill JA and Gonzalez JI and Kolb R and Pepine CJ}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={67}, number={8}, pages={671-5}}

results.title: Therapeutic rationale for the management of silent ischemia.
results.text_hl: Recently, the circadian distribution of silent @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ has been reported in 150 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ off therapy, in 33 receiving @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@, and in 41 receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Fox KM, Mulcahy DA. Therapeutic rationale for the management of silent ischemia. Circulation. 1990 Sep;82(3 Suppl):II155-60. PMID: 2203562
